metadata.title: CVE-2015-7686 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Algorithmic complexity vulnerability in Address.pm in the Email-Addressmodule 1.908 and earlier for Perl allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service (CPU consumption) via a crafted string containing a list ofe-mail addresses in conjunction with parenthesis characters that can beassociated with nested comments. NOTE: the default configuration in 1.908mitigates this vulnerability but misparses certain realistic comments.

criterions.comment: libemail-address-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
